definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Generally speaking, eunuchs in the Ming dynasty believed in Buddhism and had countless contacts with Buddhist monks.
sentences.chinese: 明代宦官普遍信奉，與佛教僧團也有廣泛的交往結納。
